metadata.Description: The concept that data is subject to the laws and governance of the country in which it is collected, stored, and processed.

entities.Description: Frameworks that define how data is collected, managed, and used within an organization or across multiple organizations.
The application of artificial intelligence techniques to optimize the operation and management of smart grids.

relations.Description: Data sovereignty implements data protection regulations to ensure the privacy and security of data.
